definition[0]: a fight between small groups of soldiers, ships etc, especially one that happens away from the main part of a battle â€“ used in news reports
example[0]: The young soldier was killed in a skirmish with government troops.
definition[1]: a short argument, especially between political or sports opponents
example[1]: Bates was sent off after a skirmish with the referee.
example[2]: a budget skirmish between the president and Congress
